amendment.description: To permit funds to be used for programs to impound the vehicles of drunk or impaired drivers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2308 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2308 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Corzine to Amendment SA 2285. (consideration: CR S1240; text: CR S1240) To permit funds to be used for programs to impound the vehicles of drunk or impaired drivers.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2308 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2308 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Corzine to Amendment SA 2285.
